name: Uncle Chunk's Project Spin
description:
An unforeseen and unaccountable event has occurred. The Earth itself has begun spinning at an extraordinary rate, mystifying experts and world leaders across the globe. This is the story of Jeep Jellybean, a single man, hapless, on a world spinning out of control!

It's so full of bugs I'm sorry also we forgot the game part we'll add it we promise

To advance the dialogue right now you have to click below the dialogue box
